get.description:
Retrieves a user's chat sessions. For user-level apps, pass [the `me` value](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/using-zoom-apis#mekeyword) instead of the `userId` parameter. 

**Note:** For an **account-level** [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app), you can only use this API on behalf of a user who is assigned a [role](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001078646-Using-role-management#:~:text=Each%20user%20in%20a%20Zoom,owner%2C%20administrator%2C%20or%20member.&text=Role%2Dbased%20access%20control%20enables,needs%20to%20view%20or%20edit.) that has the **View** or **Edit** permission for **Chat Messages**.


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_message:read`,`chat_message:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_user_sessions`,`team_chat:read:list_user_sessions:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID of the sessions being queried.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The session queried by the chat type. The API only returns sessions of which the user is a member and of the specified chat `type`. 

**Note:** 
* If no `type` is provided, the response contains both group and 1:1 chats.

parameters.name: search_star
parameters.description:
This field searches for starred groupchat and 1:1 chats.

**Note:** 
* If `search_star` is provided, `type` parameter is allowed.
* Support only user-level apps, you can pass the me value or your own userId parameter.

parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The query start date in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` format. This value defaults to the start time of today.

**Note:** 
* If `search_star` is provided, `from` parameter is not allowed.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The query end date in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` format. This value defaults to the end time of today.

**Note:** 
* If `search_star` is provided, `to` parameter is not allowed.

get.description:
Lists all the contacts of a Zoom user. Zoom categorizes contacts into **company contacts** and **external contacts**. You must specify the contact type in the `type` query parameter. If you do not specify, by default, the type is set as company contact. A user under an organization's Zoom account has internal users listed under **company contacts** in the Zoom Client. A Zoom user can also add another Zoom user as a [contact](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004055706-Managing-Contacts).

**Note:** This API only supports **user-managed** [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app).


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_contact:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_contacts`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.description:
The type of contact. The value can be one of the following:
`company`: Contacts from the user's organization.
`external`: External contacts.

 List of user's contacts returned.

get.description:
Returns information on a specific contact of the Zoom user. 

A user under an organization's Zoom account has internal users listed under Company Contacts in the Zoom Client. 

A Zoom user can also add another Zoom user as a [contact](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004055706-Managing-Contacts). 

**Note:** This API only supports **user-managed** [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app).


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_contact:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:contact`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The contact's user ID, email address, or member ID. The contact can be either a company contact or an external contact.

parameters.name: query_presence_status
parameters.description:
The presence status of the contact. 
Include this query parameter with a value of `true` to get the status of the contact in the response.

extension_number.description: The extension number of the contact.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact.

code.description: The phone number's country code. For example, the country code for phone numbers in the United States is `+1`.

country.description: The phone number's [country ID](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/abbreviation-lists#countries). For example, if the phone number provided in the `number` field is a Brazil-based number, the value is `BR`.

verified.description: Whether Zoom has verified the phone number.

The contact's presence status in the Zoom Chat client. The status can be one of the following:   
  `Do_Not_Disturb`  
  `Away`  
  `Available`  
  `Offline`  
  `In_A_Meeting`  
  `In_A_Call`  
  `In_A_Calendar_Event`  
  `Presenting`  
  `Out_of_Office`  
  `Busy`

get.description:
A user under an organization's Zoom account has internal users listed under Company Contacts in the Zoom Client. Use this API to search users that are in the company contacts of a Zoom account. Using the `search_key` query parameter, provide either first name, last name or the email address of the user that you would like to search for. Optionally, set `query_presence_status` to `true` in order to include the presence status of a contact.   
   
 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact:read:admin`,`contact:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `contact:read:list_contacts`,`contact:read:list_contacts:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: Provide the keyword - either first name, last name or email of the contact whom you have to search for.

parameters.name: query_presence_status
parameters.description: Set `query_presence_status` to `true` in order to include the presence status of a contact in the response.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned with a single API call.

parameters.name: contact_types
parameters.description:
A comma-separated list of the type of user contact to query: 
* `1` — A Zoom user. 
* `2` — An auto receptionist. 
* `3` — A common area phone. 
* `4` — A call queue. 
 * `5` — A shared line group. 
* `6` — A shared global directory. 
* `7` — A shared office contact. 
* `8` — A ZOOM Room.

**Note:** 
* You must have a [phone management role with the "**View**" permission](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360042099012-Using-Zoom-Phone-role-management) to query the `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`, and `7` values. 
* You must provide a valid `search_key` value to query this parameter.

parameters.name: user_status
parameters.description:
The Zoom user's status: 
* `active` — The user exists on the account. 
* `inactive` — The user has been deactivated. 

This value only work for the `contact_types` field is `1`, if not provide all users can be search.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`  
 
Contact returned successfully.

The user's contact type: 
* `1` — A Zoom user. 
* `2` — An auto receptionist. 
* `3` — A common area phone. 
* `4` — A call queue. 
 * `5` — A shared line group. 
* `6` — A shared global directory. 
* `7` — A shared office contact. 
* `8` — A ZOOM Room.

An IM Directory group is not the same as a channel. IM Directory allows administrators to assign users in their account to groups that display within the Contacts list on Zoom clients.

im_group_name.description: Name of the [IM directory group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749815-IM-Management) in which the user has been added. An IM Directory group is not the same as a channel. IM Directory allows administrators to assign users in their account to groups that display within the Contacts list on Zoom clients.

location.description: Location of the user as provided in the user's Zoom profile.

code.description: The phone number's country code. For example, for United States phone numbers, this will be a `+1` value.

country.description: The phone number's [country ID](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/abbreviation-lists#countries). For example, if the phone number provided in the `number` field is a Brazil-based number, this will be the `BR` value.

verified.description: Whether Zoom has verified the phone number.

presence_status.description:
Presence status of the contact in Zoom Client. The value of this field can be one of the following:
`Do_Not_Disturb`  
  `away`  
  `Available`  
  `Offline`

user_status.description:
The user's status: 
* `active` — An active user. 
* `inactive` — A deactivated user. 

This field only returns if the `contact_types` field is `1` (Zoom user)

activity.description:
The contact's activity status in Zoom client. This field only returns if the `contact_types` field is `4` (call queue): 
* `Active` 
* `Inactive` 
* `Unknown`

sip_phone_number.description: SIP Phone number of the user. Returned only if user has SIP phone enabled.

sip_uri.description: The contact's SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) URI.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call. Default value is `1`.

get.description:

* A Pro or higher plan

post.description:
Creates a shared space.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write`,`chat:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:write:shared_space`,`team_chat:write:shared_space:admin`

space_desc.description: The description of the shared space.

space_members.description: The members of the shared space.

identifier.description: The space member's user ID or member ID.

role.description:
This field indicates the role of the member.
* `member` - Normal users in the shared space.
* `owner` - Owner in the shared space.
* `admin` - Admin users in the shared space.

**Note:** Only one owner is allowed. If `role` is set to `owner`, `identifiers` must contain one element.

allow_to_add_external_users.description:
This field indicates whether external users can be added to the shared space: 
* `0` - External user cannot be added to the shared space.
* `1` - All shared space members can add external users to the shared space.
* `2` - Only shared space members within your organization can add external users to the shared space. 
* `3` - Only shared space owners and administrators can add external users to the shared space.

add_member_permissions.description:
This field indicates who can add new shared space members: 
* `1` - All shared space members can add new members to the shared space.
* `2` - Only shared space owners and administrators can add new members to the shared space.

create_channels_permission.description:
This field indicates who can create new channels or move existing channels to the shared space: 
* `1` - All shared space members can create new channels or move existing channels to the shared space.
* `2` - Only shared space owners and administrators can create new channels or move existing channels to the shared space.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description:
The user IDs or member IDs of the shared space administrators you want to demote to members, separated by comma (,). 
You can demote a maximum of 20 shared space administrators.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`  Shared space administrators successfully demoted to members.

successful_operations_count.description: The number of shared space administrators successfully demoted to memnbers.

unsuccessful_operations_count.description: The number of users failed to be demoted to shared space members.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user. It's set to an empty string for external users.

is_external_user.description: Whether the user is external to the organization.

operation_status.description:
Whether the user is demoted to shared space member.
* `successful`: The shared space administrator is successfully demoted to member.
* `unsuccessful`: Failed to demote the user to shared space member.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `5301`
Request to demote shared space administrators failed.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `200`
Unauthorized request. You don't have permission to demote shared space administrators.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `5407`
Shared space does not exist.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Returns a list of channels for a shared space.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write:admin`,`chat:read:admin`,`chat:write`,`chat:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_shared_space_channels`,`team_chat:read:list_shared_space_channels:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The space's ID

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token to paginates through large result sets. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`   Channel list returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token paginates through large result sets. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

channels.description: The channels in the shared space.

space_channel_type.description:
The shared space channel type.
* `general` - The channel is general.
* `private` - Only invited members can be added. Members do not have to join the shared space.
* `public_for_members` - Everyone in the Shared Space can join.

404.description:

patch.description:
Moves one or more channels in or out of a shared space. 


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:update:shared_space_channels`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The shared space's unique identifier ID.

channel_ids.description: The IDs of channels requested to be moved in or out of the shared space.

move_direction.description: This field indicates whether to move in or out of the shared space.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `204`Successfully moved the shared space channels.

space_id.description: The shared space's unique identifier ID.

move_direction.description: This field indicates whether to move in or out of the shared space.

is_moved.description:
The status of the channel's moving action.
* false: failed to move the channel into or out of a shared space.
* true: the channel has been successfully moved into or out of a shared space.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `200`
Unauthorized request. You do not have permission to access this shared space.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist: $userId.
**Error Code:** `300`
Shared pace does not exist: $spaceId.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Returns a list of members in a shared space.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write:admin`,`chat:read:admin`,`chat:write`,`chat:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_shared_space_members`,`team_chat:read:list_shared_space_members:admin`

parameters.description: The space's ID.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results.  A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description:
The user's role. 
* `all` - All users in the shared space. 
* `member` - Normal users in the shared space. 
* `owner` - Owner in the shared space. 
* `admin` - Admin users in the shared space. 

This value defaults to `all`.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Whether to query active users or not.
* `all` - All users in the shared space. 
* `active` - Active users in the shared space. 
* `inactive` - Inactive users in the shared space. 

This value defaults to `all`.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`   Member list returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token paginates through large set of results. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

members.description: The members in the shared space.

user_id.description: The user's ID. This value returns an empty string for external users.

email.description: The user's email address. This value returns an empty string for external users.

role.description:
The user's role. 
* `member` - Normal users in the shared space. 
* `owner` - Owner in the shared space. 
* `admin` - Admin users in the shared space.

status.description:
The user's status. 
* `active` - An active user. 
* `inactive` - A deactivated user.

is_external_user.description: Whether the user is external to the organization.

post.summary: Add members to a shared space
post.description:
Adds members to a shared space. 

**Note:** This API supports account-level apps. The user calling this API must have a [role](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001078646-Using-role-management) that has the **Edit** permission for the **Chat Channels** feature.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write`,`chat:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:write:shared_space_members`,`team_chat:write:shared_space_members:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The shared space ID.

members.description: The list of users to be added to the shared space.

identifier.description: The user ID or member ID of the user.

201.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `201`  Members successfully added to the shared space.

successful_operations_count.description: The number of users successfully added to the shared space.

unsuccessful_operations_count.description: The number of users failed to be added to the shared space.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user. It's set to an empty string for external users.

is_external_user.description: Whether the user is external to the organization.

operation_status.description:
The status of the new shared space member:
* `successful`: The user is successfully added as a shared space member.
* `unsuccessful`: Failed to add the user as a shared space member.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `5301`
Request to add members to the shared space failed.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `200`
Unauthorized request. You do not have permission to add members to the shared space.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `5407`
Shared space does not exist.
**Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist: $identifier.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

delete.summary: Remove members from a shared space
delete.description:
Removes members from a shared space. 

**Note:** This API supports account-level apps. The user calling this API must have a [role](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001078646-Using-role-management) that has the **Edit** permission for the **Chat Channels** feature.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write`,`chat:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:delete:shared_space_members`,`team_chat:delete:shared_space_members:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The shared space ID.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description:
The user ID or member ID of the shared space members or administrators you want to remove from the shared space. 

You can remove a maximum of 20 IDs, separated by commas. The owner of the shared space cannot be removed.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`  Members successfully removed from the shared space.

successful_operations_count.description: The number of users successfully removed from the shared space.

unsuccessful_operations_count.description: The number of users failed to be removed from the shared space.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user. It's set to an empty string for external users.

is_external_user.description: Whether the user is external to the organization.

operation_status.description:
Whether the user is successfully removed from the shared space.
* `successful`: The user is successfully removed from the shared space.
* `unsuccessful`: Failed to remove the user from the shared space.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `5301`
Request to remove shared space members failed.
**Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist: {member_id}.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `200`
Unauthorized request. You don't have permission to remove members from the shared space.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `5407`
Shared space does not exist.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:write`,`chat:write:admin`
